file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Errandboi
  description: A scheduling service that publishes given events to emqx and nats at the given time
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://{{baseurl}}
paths:
  /events:
    post:
      tags:
        - General
      summary: Post Events
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                type:
                  - nats
                  - emqx
                events:
                  - description: Event10
                    delay: 10s
                    topic: topic1
                    payload: hello
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          headers:
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Sun, 03 Apr 2022 07:57:22 GMT
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
            Content-Length:
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: "33"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                id: 62495362f8358c7b9d83ff4e
  /events/{eventId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - General
      summary: Get Events
      parameters:
        - name: eventId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          example: 62495362f8358c7b9d83ff4e
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          headers:
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Sun, 03 Apr 2022 07:58:37 GMT
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
            Content-Length:
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: "109"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                type:
                  - nats
                  - emqx
                events:
                  - description: Event10
                    delay: 5s
                    topic: topic1
                    payload: hello
  /events/{eventId}/status:
    get:
      tags:
        - General
      summary: Get Events Status
      parameters:
        - name: eventId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          example: 62495362f8358c7b9d83ff4e
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          headers:
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Sun, 03 Apr 2022 07:58:24 GMT
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
            Content-Length:
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: "90"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                status: done
                events:
                  - description: Event10
                    publish_date: 2022-04-11T13:31:28+04:30
                    status: Done
